profile.title: Kōtaha Kaiwhakamahi
profile.mustLogin: Me takiuru koe kia taea ai te tiro i ngā tautuhinga.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Whakaatu te taketake me te whakamāoritanga
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Whakaatu taketake me te whakamāoritanga taha ki te taha
profile.saveError: Hapa: Kāore i taea te tiaki i ngā tautuhinga
profile.noPrivateKey: Kāore he kī tūmataiti kei tēnei pūrere hei kaweake.
profile.setBackupPassword: Tautuhia he kupuhipa hei whakamuna i tō tārua:
profile.enterBackupPassword: Tāuruhia te kupuhipa mō tēnei tārua:
profile.importSuccess: Kua kawemai te kī tūmataiti ki tēnei pūrere.
profile.importFailed: I rahua te kawemai i te kī (he kupuhipa hē, he kōnae pirau rānei).
profile.keysRotated: Kua hangaia he takirua kī hou, kua tukuatu hoki te kī tūmatanui.
profile.rotateFailed: I rahua te huri i ngā kī.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Kāore tō kī tūmataiti e wehe atu i tēnei pūrere. Kaweake he tārua kua tiakina e te kupuhipa kia taea ai te whakahoki ki tētahi atu pūrere.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Kei runga koe i te Mahere Koreutu — whakamahia ngā kōwhiringa Rā/Pō i raro nei. Whakahōuhia kia wātea mai ētahi kaupapa anō.
profile.backupDesc: Waihanga tārua kua whakamunatia o ō kī, ā, whakahokia ki tētahi atu pūrere hei tukutahi.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Kohukohu ina kore te taupānga e whakamahia ana
profile.notifyOnCopy: Whakamōhio mai mēnā ka tāruatia taku karere
profile.unfollowFailed: I rahua te whakamutu i te aru
profile.followHint: Ka puta ā rātou kōrero ki tō rārangi Aru mēnā ka whakaputa ki te hunga Whai rānei, Tūmatanui rānei.
profile.followsYou: E aru ana i a koe
profile.sectionCrashedBody: I hapa tētahi mea i tēnei wāhanga.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Tukua ngā waea me ngā karere kuhu ki tō waea kua manatoko, ki tō īmēra rānei. Ka taea e ngā waea/karere puta te whakaatu i tō nama Chatforia.
profile.forwardTextsToPhone: Tukua ngā karere ki te waea
profile.forwardTextsToEmail: Tukua ngā karere ki te īmēra

chat.selectPrompt: Kōwhiria he karere, he rūma kōrerorero rānei hei tīmata i te kōrero
